content.rendered:
With Floor Mounted “Extra Long” Spray Support Boom

The PS9000 and PS10000 series utilise the proven technology of durable rotor/stator progressive cavity pumps, driven by tough 3-phase electric motors and reliable hydrostatic gearboxes. These have been developed for the traditional Hand Spray and Auto Spray processes where manufacturers need to produce at high outputs whilst maintaining consistency of quality.

  • The most popular, reliable and user-friendly spray stations available
  • Easily manoeuvrable
  • Easy manual or mechanical loading
  • Twin section control panel protected by waterproof cabinet
  • Supplied with Concentric Spray Gun (other spray heads are available)
  • Fitted with removable sieve to prevent blockages
  • Large wheels with articulated castors
  • Remote control
  • In-line lubricator for smooth running of the chopper motor
